relevant_communication:
We make a lot of seminars for debtors, pupils, seniors, social workers about Consumer Credit Directive. We are Partner EU of the Consumer Credit Campaign: 
http://ec.europa.eu/consumers/citizen/my_rights/consumer-credit/stakeholders/index_cs.htm
